user.title: Volkswagen Connect Configuration
user.description:
Fill in Volkswagen Connect information

S-PIN is required for some specific options such as lock/unlock and combustion engine heating start/stop

data.mutable: Uncheck to make the car 'read only'. Keep checked to interact with the car
data.region: Country code where the car was sold (ISO 3155-1 / Alpha-2)
data.name: Name your car (defaults to VIN number)
data.debug: Enable full debug logs from API (requires debug logging enabled in config)
data.convert: Select if you want to make any distance unit conversions

select_vehicle.title: Vehicle
select_vehicle.description: The following vehicles was found. Please select the vehicle you wish to monitor

data.description: Re-authenticate with your Volkswagen Connect account. Make sure to accept any new EULA in the Volkswagen Connect portal (https://www.myvolkswagen.net/) before proceeding.

abort.already_configured: Car with this VIN is already configured

error.cannot_connect: Could not login to Volkswagen Connect, please check your credentials and verify that the service is working
error.cannot_update: Could not query update from Volkswagen Connect

data.region: Region (The country where the car was sold)
data.debug: Enable full debug logs from API (requires debug logging enabled in config)
data.convert: Select if you want to make any distance unit conversions
